y1731_schema.description: Configure Y.1731 attributes. Y.1731 is developed by ITU-T for operations, administration and maintenance (OAM) of Ethernet, which providing fault management and performance management solutions for Ethernet.

cfm-version.description: Version of Y.1731, which can be standard or draft7.

mp-address-model.description: MAC model of Y.1731, which can be bridge or individual.

portid-tlv.description: Set the type of port ID TLV in MAC trace packet.

idle-test-id-count.description: Set the number of idle test ID for query.

global-enable.description: Configure global-enable Y.1731 attributes. Y.1731 is developed by ITU-T for operations, administration and maintenance (OAM) of Ethernet, which providing fault management and performance management solutions for Ethernet.

name.description: Configure the name of a maintenance domain (MD).

level.description: Configure the level of the maintenance domain.

format.description: Configure the format of the maintenance domain name. By default, the format is a string. If the format is MAC-address, the format name must be in form of H-H-H:U<0-65535>, for example, 0001-0001-0001:1.

format-name.description: Configure the name of the maintenance domain which will be formatted. By default, it is the same as the name of the maintenance domain.

mip-create-type.description: Configure the MIP create type of maintenance domain.

sender-tlv-type.description: Configure the sender ID TLV type of the default maintenance domain.

name.description: Configure the name of a maintenance association (MA).

format.description: Configure the format of the maintenance association's name.

format-name.description: Configure the name of the maintenance association (MA) which will be formatted. By default, as the same with the name of the MA. The length of MA format description is [1,13] when the format is ICC-based, and [1,43] when it is string.

map-service.description: Configure the type of a maintenance association's service.

vlan-id.description: Configure the VLAN ID associated with the maintenance association.

one-way-threshold-value.description: Configure the threshold of one-way delay measurement.

two-way-threshold-value.description: Configure the threshold of two-way delay measurement.

l2vc-id.description: Configure the ID of the L2VC associated with the maintenance association.

l2vc-type.description: Configure the type of the L2VC associated with the maintenance association.

l2vc-ip.description: Configure the peer IP of the L2VC associated with the maintenance association.

vsi-name.description: Configure the name of the VSI associated with the maintenance association.

packet-priority.description: Configure the priority of the packet which is sent in the maintenance association.

ccm-interval.description: Configure the interval at which CCMs are sent in a maintenance association.

alarm-occur-time.description: Configure the delay for reporting an alarm.

alarm-finish-time.description: Configure the delay for clearing an alarm.

active-time.description: Configure the time to activate an RMEP.

interface-tlv.description: Enable/disable interface status TLV in CCM.

sender-id-tlv.description: Enable/disable sender ID TLV in CCM.

port-status-tlv.description: Enable/disable port status TLV in CCM.

mip-create-type.description: Configures the MIP create type of maintenance association.

ais.description: Configure the function of all AIS instances.

interval.description: Configure the interval at which AIS packets are sent.

level.description: Configure the level of AIS packets.

if-mep.description: Configure a MEP on an interface.

tags.description: Configure the tags of a MEP.

two-tags.description: Configure the two tags of a MEP.

pe-vlan.description: Configure the PE VLAN of a MEP.

ce-vlan.description: Configure the CE VLAN of a MEP.

one-tag.description: Configure the dot1q VLAN of a MEP.

dot1q-vlan.description: Configure the dot1q VLAN of a MEP.

wtr.description: Port linkage wait to restore (WTR) time.

pw-mep.description: Configure a MEP on a PW.

peer-ip.description: Configure the IP of peer end.

direction.description: Configure the direction of a MEP.

cc-send-enable.description: Enable/disable CCMs which can be sent.

rmeps.description: List of all remote maintenance points.

id.description: Configure the ID of a RMEP.

test-id.description: Configure the ID of a test instance (65536 to 4294967295 is reserved for automatic allocation).

description.description: Configure the description of a test instance.

md-name.description: Configure the name of a maintenance domain (MD).

ma-name.description: Configure the name of a maintenance association (MA).

remote.description: Configure the RMEP ID or MAC.

peer-ip.description: Configure the IP of peer end.

one-way-delay-send.description: Configure a one-way delay measurement send instance.

interval.description: Configure the interval of one-way delay measurement send.

one-way-delay-recv.description: Configure a one-way delay measurement receive instance.

is-continue.description: Enable/disable one-way delay continue measurement receive.

two-way-delay-send.description: Configure a two-way delay measurement send instance.

interval.description: Configure the interval of two-way delay measurement send.

two-way-delay-recv.description: Configure a two-way delay measurement receive instance.

receive-enabled.description: Enable/disable two-way delay measurement receive instance.

single-loss-send.description: Configure a single-ended loss measurement send instance.

interval.description: Configure the interval of single-ended loss measurement send.

single-loss-recv.description: Configure a single-ended loss measurement receive instance.

enabled.description: Enable/disable single-ended loss measurement receive instance.

dual-loss.description: Configure a dual-ended loss measurement instance.

synthetic-loss-send.description: Configure a single ended synthetic send instance.

interval.description: Configuration interval of single ended synthetic send.

send-count.description: Configuration count of single ended synthetic send.

timeout.description: Configuration time out value of single ended synthetic send.

period.description: Configuration period of single ended synthetic loss measurement.

synthetic-loss-recv.description: Configure a single ended synthetic receive instance.

timeout.description: Configuration time out value of single ended synthetic receive.

ccm-sends.description: List of statistics about CCMs sent.

md.description: Specifies the name of a MD.

ma.description: Specifies the name of a MA.

mep-id.description: Specifies the ID of a MEP.

send-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs sent by the MEP.

ccm-receives.description: List of statistics about CCMs received.

md.description: Specifies the name of a MD.

ma.description: Specifies the name of a MA.

mep-id.description: Specifies the ID of a MEP.

rmep-id.description: Specifies the ID of a remote MEP.

receive-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs received by the MEP.

rdi-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs with the RDI flag set to 1 that the MEP receives.

tlv-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs carrying the Sender ID TLV, Port Status TLV, or Interface Status TLV field that the MEP receives.

mac-err-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs carrying the MAC address different from the MAC address configured on the remote MEP that the MEP receives.

freq-err-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs carrying the correct MEG level, MEG ID, and MEP ID but the incorrect transmission interval that the MEP receives.

ma-id-err-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs carrying the correct MEG level but the incorrect MEG ID (MAID) that the MEP receives.

level-check-strict.description: Enable/disable strict check for MD levels of CFM (802.1ag) packets.

cfm-version.description: Version of Y.1731, which can be standard or draft7.

mp-address-model.description: MAC model of Y.1731, which can be bridge or individual.

portid-tlv.description: Set the type of port ID TLV in MAC trace packet.

idle-test-id-count.description: Set the number of idle test ID for query.

global-enable_schema.description: Configure global-enable Y.1731 attributes. Y.1731 is developed by ITU-T for operations, administration and maintenance (OAM) of Ethernet, which providing fault management and performance management solutions for Ethernet.

ccm-sends.description: List of statistics about CCMs sent.

md.description: Specifies the name of a MD.

ma.description: Specifies the name of a MA.

mep-id.description: Specifies the ID of a MEP.

send-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs sent by the MEP.

ccm-receives.description: List of statistics about CCMs received.

md.description: Specifies the name of a MD.

ma.description: Specifies the name of a MA.

mep-id.description: Specifies the ID of a MEP.

rmep-id.description: Specifies the ID of a remote MEP.

receive-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs received by the MEP.

rdi-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs with the RDI flag set to 1 that the MEP receives.

tlv-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs carrying the Sender ID TLV, Port Status TLV, or Interface Status TLV field that the MEP receives.

mac-err-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs carrying the MAC address different from the MAC address configured on the remote MEP that the MEP receives.

freq-err-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs carrying the correct MEG level, MEG ID, and MEP ID but the incorrect transmission interval that the MEP receives.

ma-id-err-packet.description: Displays the number of CCMs carrying the correct MEG level but the incorrect MEG ID (MAID) that the MEP receives.

md.description: Specifies the name of a MD.

ma.description: Specifies the name of a MA.

level-check-strict.description: Enable/disable strict check for MD levels of CFM (802.1ag) packets.

contained-index.description: Information about the parent index of an entity.

parent-relative-position.description: Position of an entity relative to its parent entity.

is-fru.description: Whether the entity a replaceable unit.

ls-name.description: The LS name of the entity.

logic-entitys.description: List of information about logical entity.

logic-entity.description: Configure information about a logical entity.

parent-index.description: Information about the parent index of an entity.

parent-relative-position.description: Position of an entity relative to its parent entity.

slot-num.description: Number of slots on a chassis.

board-num.description: Number of boards on a chassis.

fan-num.description: Number of fans on a chassis.

power-num.description: Number of power modules for a chassis.

status-last-change.description: Time when the entity running status last changed.

entity-last-change.description: Time when the entity on chassis last changed.

dust-clean-cycle.description: Interval at which air filter dust is cleaned.

last-clean-date.description: Date when dust was last cleaned.

up-to-last-clean.description: Time past since dust was last cleaned.

monitor-board-changes.description: List of time when board status changes.

monitor-board-change.description: Operational data of time when the status of a board changes.

status-last-change.description: Time when the board running status changes.

entity-last-change.description: Time when the board entity changes.

up-time.description: MPU running time, expressed in the number of timeticks.

register-time.description: Time when a board goes Up.

up-time.description: LPU running time, expressed in the number of timeticks.

next-service-type.description: Type of next started service board.

pic-num.description: Number of PICs on an LPU.

pic.description: Operational data of physical interface card.

up-time.description: Time when a card goes Up.

memory-size.description: Memory size of a CF card.

memory-used.description: Used memory of a CF card.

memory-free.description: Available memory of a CF card.

position.description: Port position. The position is expressed in the format of slotID/cardID/portID. For example, 1/0/1. Here 1/0/1 is an example. The value may vary with devices.

type.description: Port type, such as ETH, POS, or OTN.

last-up-time.description: Time when a port last went Up.

last-down-time.description: Time when a port last went Down.

optical-equipped.description: Flag indicating whether an optical transceiver is equipped.

port-type.description: Port type, such as ETH, POS, or OTN.

is-resetable.description: Flag indicating whether the entity can be reset.

is-switchoverable.description: Flag indicating whether a switchover can be performed on the entity.

schedule-reboot.description: Statistics of schedule reboot date time.
